name: Slime Simulation
desc: An implementation of slime mold cellular automata. Written in Python using the modernGL library and compute shaders written in GLSL.

name: Maze Generator
desc: A web app that allows for the generation of random mazes. It also showcases an RBAC system that allow the user to create, delete, or just view the mazes

name: Poly Plotter
desc: A react app that allows for the rendering of polynomials on a graph using canvas HTML.

name: Voxel Terrain
desc: A unity demo that showcases a randomly generated voxel terrain based on Minecraft. Made with unity game engine.
